channel.title: F/OSS on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in F/OSS on Joone Blog

item.title: OSCON 2014
item.description: I attended OSCON 2014 held in Portland, Oregon. I think Portland is the Mecca of Open Source because OSCON is held there every year and Intel Open Source Technology center is also in Hillsboro near Portland.

item.title: Richard Stallman comes to Korea
item.description: <img src="http://kldp.org/files/mail-1.png" alt=""> Next week he is going to vist Korea to address the new GPL and free software.
